title.narrative: Experts and stakeholders reference the project’s outputs to directly inform approaches for improving livelihoods in developing countries.

description.narrative:
Baseline (2019) Progress on the SDGs has slowed and a significant portion of the population in developing countries remains exposed to the risks of poverty, climate change, and conflict.
Target (2019) Independent research and informative convenings help experts and actors in developing countries understand the challenges, and devise workable policy solutions.
